Through the goodness and mercy of Christ the sinner is to be restored to the divine favor. God in Christ is daily beseeching men to be reconciled to God. With outstretched arms He is ready to receive and welcome not only the sinner but the prodigal. His dying love, manifested on Calvary, is the sinner's assurance of acceptance, peace, and 
                                                                           179
love. Teach these things in the simplest form, that the sin-darkened soul may see the light shining from the cross of Calvary.
